snippet: Lampard will carry on playing for Manchester City throughout the Premier League season, delaying his arrival in M.L.S. for New York City F.C.
abstract: Midfielder Frank Lampard will stay with Manchester City through Premier League season before moving to New York City FC; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lampard will carry on playing for Manchester City throughout the Premier League season, delaying his arrival in M.L.S. for New York City F.C.

headline.main: Frank Lampard’s Stay in England Is Extended
headline.print_headline: Longer Stay in England for Lampard
